alert.note: Alert for Orange (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS New York City - Upton (Long Island and New York City)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 04 at 8:10PM EDT by NWS New York City - Upton
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT NORTHWESTERN ORANGE COUNTY THROUGH 900 PM EDT... At 810 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Thompsonville, or near Monticello, moving southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Middletown, Walden, Goshen, Howells, Montgomery, Otisville, Scotchtown, Mechanicstown, Maybrook, Pine Bush, Circleville, Bullville, and New Hampton. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM EDT for southeastern New York.
